description.@value: Spice up an ordinary burger with our Cuban Black Bean spread!

ingredients.@value: 1 container Better Bean Cuban Black BeansHilary's brand Black Rice veggie burgersArugulaHamburger buns

name.@value: Veggie Burger with Black Bean Spread

recipeIngredient.@value: Hilary's brand Black Rice veggie burgers
1 container Better Bean Cuban Black Beans

recipeInstructions.@value:
Cook veggie burger according to package. While burgers cook, heat beans in a small skillet.
Just spread the beans on your burgers, top with arugula and you’re good to go!
